CustomField.description: This field is used in the Wage Claim Referral Flow to tie a Wage office Account Record to the DIR Office Record in order for a WCA Claim Referral to go to the right group. This should be removed after Wage is changed, and the Flow changed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used in the Wage Claim Referral Flow to tie a Wage office Account Record to the DIR Office Record in order for a WCA Claim Referral to go to the right group. This should be removed after Wage is changed, and the Flow changed.
CustomField.label: BOFE Office
